item.title: The Mental Struggle of WFH
item.description: The Mental Struggle of WFH and overcomming lazyness and the Sarlacc pit of despair - The Mental Struggle of WFH and Overcomming the Pit of Dispair Where you smashing out work for 12hours a day straight, felt like you were on a tredmill at equal pace to Usain Bolt during the 100m in 2014 and then all of a sudden you got hit with the...

item.title: Necronomicon Revived!
item.description: Where the hell have I been? - Well it’s been almost 2 years since I last did a post, or even blown the dust of this old necronomicon… Why? Overall it can be summed up in one word: Life Life Summed Up As with anything in life, you build a set of hobbies and activities, and each...

item.title: Git Good
item.description: Basic Knowledge Dump of Git and Github - This is just some testing grounds on understanding, utilising and getting better at Git. This is something I have been trying to do for a while so why not use it as a testing ground, but also share some notes. I dont really like the idea of “those who can’t...

item.title: ./helloWorld.sh
item.description: Yet Another InfoSec Blog Poster - Hello World! My first ever post using the beautiful-jekyll theme and gitpages setup! Why U do dis? Yet another Cyber Security Blog… I know. But I am hoping that posting the random shit I do can also intice the reader a little longer and be a little more engaged. Basically,...
